fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, External Relations, Public Health, Borders and Security
person_with_legal_responsibility: Emmanuel Jacob (in the name of the Board)
eu_initiatives: Main fields of interest: CSDP, fundamental rights and freedoms, social and labour legislation.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
EUROMIL is participating in the Fundamental Rights Platform (FRP) of the EU Agency for Fundamental Rights (FRA). 
The organisation has participatory status with the Council of Europe (CoE) and consultative status with the UN Economic and Social Council (ECOSOC).  
EUROMIL also maintains contacts with the North Atlantic Treaty Organization Parliamentary Assembly (NATO PA) and the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe (OSCE). 
Additionally, EUROMIL is a member of the European Movement International (EMI), Friends of Europe and the Kangaroo Group.
